name: Aurabon
description: Aurabon is a mysterious pokemon that inhabits the highest peaks of the mountainous terrain. It's appearance is characterized by a majestic, golden crystal headband and a majestic, electric blue fur coat. Aurabon spends most of its day perched atop a mountain peak, surveying the lands below with its keen, electric-charged senses. When danger arises, Aurabon can call upon its Electric Fury and Zapstrike abilities to fend off predators. Despite its intimidating exterior, Aurabon is a gentle creature that is rarely seen away from its mountain home.
image_prompt: a electric-type bear pokemon::1.8, wearing a golden crystal headband, in a mountain environment, glittering yellow background, inked watercolor anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
